thread.title: Chelsea news: David Luiz still playing through pain after Sergio Aguero tackle | Metro News
thread.title_full: Chelsea news: David Luiz still playing through pain after Sergio Aguero tackle | Metro News

author: Mark Brus For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Chelsea news: David Luiz still playing through pain after Sergio Aguero tackle | Metro News
text:
Chelsea’s David Luiz still playing through pain after Sergio Aguero tackle gossip Mark Brus for Metro.co.uk Thursday 23 Feb 2017 10:47 pm Antonio Conte is taking a big risk with David Luiz (Picture: Getty) 
David Luiz is reportedly playing through the pain for Chelsea as he continues to be troubled by a rough challenge from Sergio Aguero in the Manchester City game back in December. Keep smiling! Mourinho of all people melts hearts with touching message to Ranieri 
The Brazil international has had to wear a bandage on his right knee since the dangerous tackle from Aguero, and the Blues are nursing him carefully through the remainder of the campaign. 
Antonio Conte won’t want to lose the summer signing from Paris Saint-Germain, who has been superb since rejoining Chelsea for a second spell last summer. Luiz has been playing through the pain for Chelsea (Picture: Getty) Luiz hasn’t managed to shake off the pain from this challenge (Picture: Getty) 
Luiz sat out the recent FA Cup win over Wolves, but Chelsea lack a huge number of alternatives to the 29-year-old at the back.
